product_identification.name: Ergonomic Mesh Back Office Chair
product_identification.intended_use: General office use for employees requiring comfortable and adjustable seating for extended periods to promote good posture and reduce physical strain.

technical_requirements.dimensions: Overall Height: Adjustable 40-45 inches (101.6-114.3 cm), Overall Width: 27 inches (68.6 cm) maximum including armrests, Overall Depth: 25 inches (63.5 cm) maximum, Seat Height Adjustment Range: 16-21 inches (40.6-53.3 cm), Seat Width: 19 inches (48.3 cm) minimum, Seat Depth Adjustment Range: 16-18 inches (40.6-45.7 cm), Backrest Height: 20 inches (50.8 cm) minimum from seat, Armrest Height Adjustment Range: 7-10.5 inches (17.8-26.7 cm) from seat.
materials: Backrest: Breathable mesh fabric with minimum tensile strength of 200 lbs, color: Black.
Seat Cushion: High-density foam, minimum 1.8 lb/ft³ density, upholstered with durable fabric, minimum 100,000 double rubs (Wyzenbeek method), color: Black.
Frame: Steel frame construction with powder-coated finish, color: Black.
Armrests: Polyurethane (PU) armrest pads with steel internal structure, adjustable height, width, and pivot.
Base: 5-star base, 28-inch (71.1 cm) diameter, constructed from reinforced nylon or steel, color: Black.
Casters: Dual-wheel casters, 2-inch diameter, suitable for carpet and hard floors, black nylon.

adjustability_features: Seat Height Adjustment: Pneumatic height adjustment mechanism with a range of 16-21 inches (40.6-53.3 cm).
Seat Depth Adjustment: Sliding seat pan mechanism providing a depth adjustment range of 15-18 inches (38.1-45.7 cm).
Backrest Recline: Reclining backrest with adjustable tension and locking mechanism, range of 95-120 degrees.
Lumbar Support Adjustment: Adjustable lumbar support mechanism, both height and depth adjustable within a range of 2 inches (5.1 cm) in each direction.
Armrest Adjustment: Height adjustable armrests with a range of 7-10.5 inches (17.8-26.7 cm) from the seat, width adjustable by 2 inches (5.1 cm) per armrest, and pivot adjustable by +/- 15 degrees.
Headrest Adjustment (if applicable): Height and angle adjustable headrest with a range of 4 inches (10.2 cm) in height and 30 degrees in angle.
ergonomic_standards: Lumbar support design should conform to ergonomic best practices for spinal alignment.

certifications: Greenguard Gold Certification for low chemical emissions required.
testing_requirements: BIFMA X5.1-2017 Seating Tests: Must pass all applicable tests including but not limited to: Durability Tests (cycles and load), Strength Tests, Stability Tests, and Impact Tests. Test reports to be provided.
Weight Capacity Test: Chair must withstand a static load of 300 lbs (136 kg) for 1 minute without structural failure. Test reports to be provided.
Material Testing: Material certifications for foam density, fabric abrasion resistance, mesh tensile strength, and base material strength to be provided.

safety_standards: Compliant with all applicable OSHA safety standards for office furniture.
No sharp edges or pinch points in accessible areas.
environmental_considerations: Minimum 30% recycled content in product materials.
BIFMA level® certification, minimum level 1 preferred.
Product should be designed for disassembly to facilitate recycling at end-of-life. Disassembly instructions to be provided.
VOC emissions compliant with ANSI/BIFMA X7.1-2011.
Packaging materials should be made from minimum 50% recycled content and be recyclable.

identified_issues.issue_description: The specification uses vague and subjective terms instead of quantifiable technical specifications. For example, 'Resolution: Good quality' and 'Response Time: Fast' are not measurable and do not provide clear requirements for suppliers.
identified_issues.location_in_document: Section 2, Technical Specifications, Resolution and Response Time
identified_issues.correction: Replace 'Resolution: Good quality' with a specific resolution such as 'Resolution: 1920x1080 (Full HD) minimum'. Replace 'Response Time: Fast' with a quantifiable response time such as 'Response Time: 5ms (milliseconds) or less'.

identified_issues.issue_description: The 'Connectivity: Multiple ports' requirement is ambiguous. It does not specify which ports are required, making it unclear for suppliers and potentially leading to unsuitable products being delivered.
identified_issues.correction: Specify the required ports, for example: 'Connectivity: Must include at least one HDMI port, one DisplayPort, and one VGA port'.

identified_issues.issue_description: The 'Quality Standards' section is vague and relies on subjective criteria like 'Must meet company standards' and 'Should be from a reputable brand'. These are not objective quality standards and do not provide measurable criteria for acceptance.
identified_issues.correction: Replace vague statements with specific, measurable quality standards. For example, specify industry certifications like 'ISO 9001 certified manufacturer' or performance-based testing requirements and acceptance criteria. Referencing the 'Previous model used: Dell P2419H' in 'Additional Notes' could be used to derive specific quality benchmarks or features.

identified_issues.issue_description: The 'Warranty' requirement is missing entirely from the specification. Warranty information is crucial for product specifications as it defines the supplier's responsibility for product defects and failures after purchase.
identified_issues.correction: Add a 'Warranty' section specifying the required warranty period for the monitor. For example: 'Warranty: Supplier must provide a minimum 3-year warranty covering parts and labor for defects in materials and workmanship under normal office use.'

identified_issues.issue_description: The 'Delivery' section contains vague and non-committal terms like 'Delivery within reasonable time' and 'Must be in good condition upon arrival'. These terms are not enforceable and do not provide clear expectations for delivery performance.
identified_issues.correction: Replace vague terms with specific and measurable delivery requirements. For example: 'Delivery: Required within 10 business days of order placement to [Specific Department/Location]. Products must be delivered in undamaged packaging and in good working condition. Supplier is responsible for any damage during shipping.'
